comments: Abolished 25.3.1886 and added to the parish of Cayton.

county: Yorkshire East Riding and Yorkshire North Riding
comments:
In 1889 the Yorkshire North Riding part of Filey became 
    part of Yorkshire East Riding, so that thereafter Filey was wholly in Yorkshire 
    East Riding. See also Table 2, note (b).
Abolished 25.3.1886 and added to the parish of Throxenby.
Abolished 25.3.1886 and added to the parish of Cayton.
Abolished 25.3.1886 and added to the parish of Brompton.
Abolished 1.4.1974 to become an unparished area.
Abolished 1.4.1909 and added to the parish of Scalby.
